key.name: schema-version
key.summary: The version of the settings schema
key.description: This value is incremented when the settings schema changes.

key.name: browse-inside-application
key.summary: Open links inside of Liferea?
key.description: If set to true, links clicked will be opened inside of Liferea, otherwise they will be opened in the selected external browser.

key.name: browse-key-setting
key.summary: Selects which key to use to pagedown or go to the next unread item
key.description: Selects which key to use to pagedown or go to the next unread item. Set to 0 to use space, 1 to use ctrl-space, or 2 to use alt-space.

key.name: browser
key.summary: Selects the browser command to use when browser_module is set to manual
key.description: Selects the browser command to use when browser_module is set to manual.

key.name: browser-id
key.summary: Selects which browser to use to open external links
key.description: Selects which browser to use to open external links. The choices include "default" and "manual".

key.name: confirm-mark-all-read
key.summary: Get a confirmation dialog when marking all read
key.description: If TRUE Liferea will display a confirmation dialog before marking all items of the selected feed as read.

key.name: default-view-mode
key.summary: The default view mode for feed list nodes.
key.description: The default view mode for displaying feed list nodes. Possible values: 0=email like 3-pane, 1=wide view 3-pane, 2=auto switching

key.name: defer-delete-mode
key.summary: Defer hiding read items from search folders.
key.description: If this option is enabled, defer hiding read items until the search folder is switched.

key.name: default-update-interval
key.summary: Default interval for fetching feeds.
key.description: This value specifies how often Liferea tries to update feeds. The value is given in minutes. When setting the interval always consider the traffic it produces. Setting a value less than 15min almost never makes sense.

key.name: disable-javascript
key.summary: Allows to disable Javascript.
key.description: Allows to disable Javascript.

key.name: disable-toolbar
key.summary: Disable displaying the toolbar in the Liferea main window
key.description: Disable displaying the toolbar in the Liferea main window.

key.name: last-hpane-pos
key.summary: Height of the itemlist pane in the mainwindow
key.description: Height of the itemlist pane in the mainwindow. Use 0 to let GTK+ decide the height.

key.name: last-vpane-pos
key.summary: Width of the feedlist pane in the mainwindow
key.description: Width of the feedlist pane in the mainwindow. Use 0 to let GTK+ decide the width.

key.name: last-window-height
key.summary: Height of the Liferea main window
key.description: Height of the Liferea main window. Use 0 to let GTK+ decide on the height.

key.name: last-window-maximized
key.summary: Mainwindow is maximized when Liferea starts up
key.description: Determines if the Liferea main window will be maximized at startup.

key.name: last-window-fullscreen
key.summary: Mainwindow is fullscreened when Liferea starts up
key.description: Determines if the Liferea main window will be fullscreened at startup.

key.name: last-window-width
key.summary: Width of the Liferea main window
key.description: Width of the Liferea main window. Use 0 to let GTK+ decide on the width.

key.name: last-window-x
key.summary: Left position of the Liferea main window
key.description: Left position of the Liferea main window.

key.name: last-window-y
key.summary: Top position of the Liferea main window
key.description: Top position of the Liferea main window.

key.name: last-zoomlevel
key.summary: Zoom level of the HTML view
key.description: Zoom level of the HTML view. (100 = 1:1)

key.name: last-node-selected
key.summary: Node id of the last feed list selection
key.description: When shutting down Liferea saves the last selected node id here to be restored on startup.

key.name: maxitemcount
key.summary: Determines the default number of items saved on each feed
key.description: This value is used to determine how many items are saved in each feed when Liferea exits. Note that marked items are always saved.

key.name: startup-feed-action
key.summary: Determines if subscriptions are to be updated at startup
key.description: Numeric value determines whether Liferea shall updates all subscriptions at startup (0=yes, otherwise=no). Inverse logic for compatibility reasons.

key.name: folder-display-mode
key.summary: DEPRECATED, migrated to folder-display-children.
key.description: If set to 0 no items are displayed when selecting a folder. If set to 1 all items of all child nodes are displayed when selecting a folder.

key.name: folder-display-children
key.summary: Determine if folders show all child content.
key.description: If enabled no items are displayed when selecting a folder. If set to 1 all items of all child nodes are displayed when selecting a folder.

key.name: folder-display-hide-read
key.summary: Filter read items when displaying folders.
key.description: If enabled and folder-display-children is TRUE when clicking a folder only the unread items of all child nodes will be displayed.

key.name: reduced-feedlist
key.summary: Filter feeds without unread items from feed list.
key.description: If this option is enabled the feed list will contain only feeds that have unread items.

key.name: proxy-detect-mode
key.summary: Proxy mode.
key.description: This options determines what kind of proxy will be used.

key.name: proxy-host
key.summary: NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! Proxy host.
key.description: This options determines the proxy host.

key.name: proxy-port
key.summary: NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! Proxy port.
key.description: This options determines the proxy port.

key.name: proxy-use-authentication
key.summary: NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! Proxy auth.
key.description: This options determines if auth is requiered.

key.name: proxy-authentication-user
key.summary: NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! Proxy user.
key.description: This options determines auth username.

key.name: proxy-authentication-password
key.summary: NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! Proxy password.
key.description: This options determines auth password.

key.name: social-bm-site
key.summary: Social bookmark site
key.description: This option determines which social bookmark site use to save links.

key.name: last-wpane-pos
key.summary: Width of the itemlist pane in the mainwindow
key.description: Width of the itemlist pane in the mainwindow. Use 0 to let GTK+ decide the Width.

key.name: enable-itp
key.summary: Enable intelligent tracking protection
key.description: This options determines if liferea should enable WebKit's intelligent tracking protection.

key.name: enable-reader-mode
key.summary: Enable reader mode
key.description: This options toggles reader mode usage in the item view. If enabled Readability.js will be used for filtering content.

key.name: browser-font
key.summary: User defined browser-font
key.description: This option defines which font should be used to render in the browser. If not specified system setting will be used.

key.name: do-not-track
key.summary: Send "Do Not Track" header
key.description: Configures wether the "DNT" header is to be sent. If enabled sends "DNT: 1", meaning do not track user requests.

key.name: do-not-sell
key.summary: Send "Do Not Sell" header
key.description: Configures wether the "Sec-GPC" header is to be sent. If enabled sends "Sec-GPC: 1", meaning do not share or sell user information.

key.name: list-view-column-order
key.summary: Item list view column order
key.description: The column order in the item list view.

key.name: intranet-connectivity
key.summary: Accept that there is not internet available.
key.description: Enable this if you are in an intranet with no internet connectivity. Otherwise updates won't work.

key.name: active-plugins
key.summary: Active (non-builtin) plugins
key.description: List of active (non-builtin) plugins. It contains the "Module" names of the active plugins. See the .plugin file for obtaining the "Module" name of a given plugin. Note: built-in plugins are always loaded, so we do not list them here.
